results.name: To Take Root Among The Stars

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / Intel® HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 257,57 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS (desktop-amd64)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz × 4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Corporation GM107M [GeForce GTX 960M]
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz × 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Corporation GM107M [GeForce GTX 960M]
  • Storage: 510 MB available space
